thread.title: iVOOMi iV505 with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 3,000mAh battery launched for Rs 3,999
thread.title_full: iVOOMi iV505 with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 3,000mAh battery launched for Rs 3,999

title: iVOOMi iV505 with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 3,000mAh battery launched for Rs 3,999
text:
iVOOMi iV505 with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 3,000mAh battery launched for Rs... iVOOMi iV505 with 5-inch display, VoLTE and 3,000mAh battery launched for Rs 3,999 By March 7, 2017 “iVOOMi is the latest Chinese brand to enter India’s smartphone market” 
India’s fast growing smartphone market has attracted several new smartphone manufacturers around the world, with the most recent being a Chinese OEM vendor by the name of iVOOMi. iVOOMi is making its debut with the dual-SIM iV505, which comes with 4G VoLTE support on both SIM slots. The iV505 sports a 5-inch qHD IPS display, and is powered by a quad-core processor clocked at 1.3GHz aided by a gig of RAM. The smartphone comes equipped with 5MP cameras on the back as well as the front. It sources its fuel from a 3,000mAh battery with fast charging, and runs Android Marshmallow with a skin of SmartMe OS on top. iVOOMi has partnered with ShopClues to sell its iV505 smartphone, which is priced at Rs 3,999. It is currently available for pre-order, and will be available starting March 9th. Facebook Comments
